ComicInfo.Title: The American Space Base on Mars; The Horn; The Movie Monsters Strike...; Getting the Gate in '68; The Duck Hunter; Modern Chess Set; Cracked Future Antiques; The Bully; Historical Scoops; Inside Dope; What I'd Like to Be When I Grow Up; The Evolution of Beauty Contests; The Rescue; Ads of Yore
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.When a monsters union goes on strike the movie monsters have to find new occupations. Undaunted, Hollywood finds new ways to depict horror.
A duck hunter is undone by a duck who uses a decoy to lure the hunter into a trap.
Tired of being abused by a bully on the beach our protagonist takes a bodybuilding course. Unfortunately, so does the bully.
When Superguy is found changing his clothes inside a telephone booth the police arrest him.
